title: Festival of Light 2009
description: After a truly amazing and comprehensive Sliders-1, 2 & 3 program, this FOL workshop will definitely be remembered for its atmosphere of Celebration for the Kristic Mission. FOL 2009 also marked a clear and positive turning point in the ability for Team Indigo (and all who choose to come on this Journey on NET Earth) to engage more fully their own personal lines of Kristic communication and transformative healing. The workshop then kicked off with a run through of a selection of the Sliders-1 and -2 techniques including Induction of the AllurÃ¢â‚¬â„¢E-ah Rashatan Code, Creating the TEÃ¢â‚¬â„¢a-Wha Vision Seed, Activating the Organic Pentagonal Circulation and Activating the Grail Window Parts A-E. Then after a brief update on the Treaty of Al-BhenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢-Yhan and the Krist Fall Host, Team Indigo called in the first of the AquaiÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ Solar Luna Transmissions (AquaiÃ¢â‚¬â„¢-ah de So-LaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢-RA LUÃ¢â‚¬â„¢na Ah-VE-yas Elemental Living Light Transmissions), Median Earth pulses that travel at nano-speed and which will continue to build between now and 2230. The final lecture consisted of a wonderfully detailed update on the Chronology of the Cosmic Drama, where the number of Kristic Mission Upgrades far outnumbered the number of Drama Escalations (Drama Escalation # 28 to 31 and Mission Upgrade # 27 to 38 are covered in the supplement).
